com.radirius.merc.part

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.merc.part.Particle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MercEntity, Renderable, Updatable, Wipeable

    public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object
implements MercEntity, Wipeable
    A class that will represent a single particle, with a parent emitter.
    Author:
    wessles
